level.heading: Duties re-elections.
level.text: ยง 10-105 Duties re-elections. It shall be the duty of the police force, or any member thereof, to prevent any booth, or box, or structure for the distribution of tickets at any election from being erected or maintained within one hundred fifty feet of any polling place within the city, and summarily to remove any such booth, box or structure, or to close and prevent the use thereof.
